description: This file defines a Fragment called StatusFragment for an Android application. It displays connection status, battery level, and error messages related to a connected device, leveraging ViewModels and LiveData to update the UI with live device status.

classes.name: StatusFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays connection status, battery level, and last error message related to a device, by observing a SharedDeviceViewModel.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up UI components and observes device status LiveData to update the UI with current connection state, device info, battery level, and error messages.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of StatusFragment.
